name: wsChat server
motd:
Welcome to $(serverName)$
Run /help to see a list of commands
HUGE CLIENT UPDATE
- Client now supports links!
- You can now {b}style{/b} your {i}messages{/i} with \{b} or \{i} tags!
- {c#ff1111}Color support{/c} with {c#22aaff}\{c#HEXCOLOR}{/c} tags
fullMessage: Sorry, but the server is full right now, come back later
